import{apiFetch}from"./client";/**
 * ADMIN: Fetch all active workers
 */export function fetchWorkers(){return apiFetch("/api/admin/workers");}/**
 * ✅ NEW - ADMIN/SECURITY: Fetch active residents for dropdowns
 * Matches backend: GET /api/admin/residents
 */export function fetchResidents(){return apiFetch("/api/admin/residents");}/**
 * ADMIN: Update user role or status
 */export function updateUserRoleStatus(userId,payload){return apiFetch("/api/admin/users/".concat(userId),{method:"PATCH",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}
